reading_passages.text: Lesson 1 Big Idea The Eastern Mediterranean, a region with a dry climate and valuable resources, sits in the middle of three continents. Main Ideas •The Eastern Mediterranean’s physical features include the Bosporus, the Dead Sea, rivers, mountains, deserts, and plains.
